select c1.id as city_id, c1.country_code as city_country_code, c1.district as city_distrtict, c1.population as city_population, c2.code as country_code, c2.name as country_name, c2.continent as country_continent, c2.region as country_region, c2.surface_area as country_surface_area, c2.indep_year as country_indep_year, c2.population as country_population, c2.life_expectancy as country_life_expectancy, c2.gnp as country_gnp, c2.gnp_old as country_gnp_old, c2.local_name as country_code, c2.government_form as country_code, c2.head_of_state as country_code, c2.capital as country_code, c2.code2 as country_code
